item.title: Why Are More and More Enterprise Users Abandoning VMware?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Following Broadcom’s acquisition of VMware, many enterprise users are seeking alternatives. Nutanix, as a hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) solution, offers lower costs and a simpler management interface, making it a good option.
